notes.text:
IBM Java 6 was updated to version 6.0-16.30.

Following security issue was fixed: CVE-2016-3485

Please see https://www.ibm.com/developerworks/java/jdk/alerts/ for more information.

notes.text: Unspecified vulnerability in Oracle Java SE 6u115, 7u101, and 8u92; Java SE Embedded 8u91; and JRockit R28.3.10 allows local users to affect integrity via vectors related to Networking.
